  • Constructor Details

    • ApplicantApplicationView

      public ApplicantApplicationView()

  • Method Details

    • showMainMenu

      public static int showMainMenu()
      Displays the main menu for managing applications, offering options such as:
      • Viewing current applications
      • Viewing available projects
      • Submitting a new application
      • Withdrawing an application
      The user is prompted to select one of the available options.
      Returns:
      The index of the selected option or a value corresponding to a back action if the user chooses to go back

    • displayApplicationList

      public static void displayApplicationList(List<Application> applications, String header)
      Displays a list of applications with their relevant details such as:
      • Project name
      • Flat type
      • Application status
      • Application date
      If the list is empty, a message indicating no applications are found is displayed.
      Parameters:
      applications - A list of Application objects to display.
      header - The header text to display before the list of applications.

    • displayApplicationDetails

      public static void displayApplicationDetails(Application application)
      Displays the detailed information of a given application including:
      • Project details
      • Flat type
      • Application status
      • Application date
      If the application has been approved or processed, the details of the user who performed the action will also be displayed. If the application is associated with a project, project details will be shown.
      Parameters:
      application - The Application object containing the details to be displayed. If the application is null, a message indicating that the details are unavailable will be shown.

    • displayEligibleProjects

      public static void displayEligibleProjects(List<Project> eligibleProjects)
      Displays the list of eligible projects for the applicant. If no projects are found, a message indicating this will be shown.
      Parameters:
      eligibleProjects - The list of eligible Project objects to be displayed.

    • promptProjectSelection

      public static int promptProjectSelection(List<Project> eligibleProjects)
      Prompts the user to select a project from a list of eligible projects. Displays the eligible projects and then allows the user to select a project number, or cancel the selection.
      Parameters:
      eligibleProjects - The list of eligible Project objects for the user to select from.
      Returns:
      The selected project number, or 0 if the user cancels the selection.

    • promptFlatTypeSelection

      public static int promptFlatTypeSelection(Project project)
      Prompts the user to select a flat type from the available options for a given project. Displays available flat types along with prices, then allows the user to select a flat type number.
      Parameters:
      project - The Project for which the available flat types are to be displayed.
      Returns:
      The selected flat type number.

    • displaySubmissionSuccess

      public static void displaySubmissionSuccess()
      Displays a success message when an application has been successfully submitted.

    • displaySubmissionError

      public static void displaySubmissionError(String error)
      Displays an error message when there is an issue with submitting an application.
      Parameters:
      error - The error message to be displayed.

    • displayWithdrawalSuccess

      public static void displayWithdrawalSuccess()
      Displays a success message when an application withdrawal has been successfully requested.

    • displayWithdrawalError

      public static void displayWithdrawalError(String error)
      Displays an error message when there is an issue with requesting an application withdrawal.
      Parameters:
      error - The error message to be displayed.

    • handleWithdraw

      public static void handleWithdraw(Applicant applicant)
      Allows the applicant to withdraw an application. Displays a list of applications that can be withdrawn, and prompts the applicant to select one for withdrawal. A confirmation is required. If the withdrawal is successful, a success message is displayed; otherwise, an error message is shown.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The Applicant whose applications are being managed.
